desc: This course focuses on evidence-based best practices in reading instruction that can be used across the curriculum by secondary teachers. Students acquire the necessary knowledge, skills, and strategies to teach reading in the teaching candidate's content area(s).Ten hours of field experience required. Offered each semester. Prerequisite: EDUC 330 or permission of the instructor.
name: Reading in Content Area
notes: Open to Juniors and Seniors only.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: EDUC 330 or permission of the instructor.
